properties.entry: INSERT INTO ENTRANCE ( ENT_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ENT_TITLE , ENT_APPLYDATE , ANIMAL_VARIETY , ANIMAL_NAME , ANIMAL_GENDER , ANIMAL_AGE , ANIMAL_VACCINATED , ANIMAL_NEUTRALIZATION , ANIMAL_DISEASE , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ENT_WANT_DATE , ENT_WANT_TIME , REQ_PHONE , ANIMAL_TYPE ) VALUES ( 'EN-'||LPAD(SEQ_EN.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACH_NO , REF_NO , PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ATTACH_LEVEL ) VALUES ( 'AT-'||LPAD(SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , 'EN-'||LPAD(SEQ_EN.CURRVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT ENT_NO , ENT_TITLE , PROCESS_RESULT , PATH||CHANGE_NAME "titleimg" FROM ENTRANCE JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (ENT_NO = REF_NO) WHERE ATTACH_LEVEL = 1 AND ENT_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ENT_NO DESC
SELECT ATTACH_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ?

SELECT ENT_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , ENT_TITLE , ENT_APPLYDATE , PROCESS_RESULT , ANIMAL_VARIETY , ANIMAL_NAME , ANIMAL_GENDER , ANIMAL_AGE , ANIMAL_VACCINATED , ANIMAL_NEUTRALIZATION , ANIMAL_DISEASE , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ENT_WANT_DATE , ENT_WANT_TIME , REQ_PHONE , ANIMAL_TYPE FROM ENTRANCE WHERE ENT_NO = ?
